comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.body: Hi! Just a tip I could gave you. Instead of open a new thread for every loan, just keep in the same thread, since you can updating the Subject. Then just make it looks as easy in the thread, like when you repaid the last loan make a post like this -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------New Loan-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------This for sure could be done 1000 times easier then my suggestion, but just a idea instead of open a new thread all time.And I think it would be easy to manage and find out the right loan, and everything. I don't think it would be that confusing.Anyway, good luck whatever you feels for go with, you sure know more then me here, but what I learned is that less is more.
